name: transliterate_any_to_latin
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webit_language.
Tool description: A.I. Text Paraphrase (Rewrite), Dictionary (Lookup, Examples, Bilingual, Synonyms, Antonyms), Key Phrases, Sentences Breaker.
API description: Transliteration endpoint provides you with transliteration of text from any language to Latin. Transliterate "こんにちは" to "kon'nichiha" with ease.

text.description: The text to be transliterated to Latin script.
